description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Swampcall]

You call upon the spirits of the soil to twist and churn, transforming the terrain in the targeted area into a sodden mess. The area becomes difficult terrain. Creatures in the area when you Cast this Spell must attempt a Reflex saving throw.

Critical Failure The creature sinks partially into the mud. The creature takes a -15-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds (except for its swim Speed, if any) and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Flat-Footed]. These effects last until the creature leaves the area or until the end of its next turn, whichever comes first.
